verses.name: Numbers 32:4
verses.text: Even the country which the Lord smote before the congregation of Israel, is a land for cattle, and thy servants have cattle:

verses.name: Numbers 32:5
verses.text: Wherefore, said they, if we have found grace in thy sight, let this land be given unto thy servants for a possession, and bring us not over Jordan.

verses.name: Numbers 32:6
verses.text: And Moses said unto the children of Gad and to the children of Reuben, Shall your brethren go to war, and shall ye sit here?

verses.name: Numbers 32:7
verses.text: And wherefore discourage ye the heart of the children of Israel from going over into the land which the Lord hath given them?
